description: Try our easy to follow Mezze Platter recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mezze Platter Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper. Place bread onto trays and spray with olive oil. Sprinkle with Moroccan seasoning. Bake for 10 minutes or until golden and crisp. Cool and break into shards.
Meanwhile, to make the hummus, process chickpeas, orange rind and juice, spices and oil into a food processor and process until smooth. Transfer to a bowl.

Heat a chargrill pan over high heat. Spray vegetables with oil. Cook for 2 minutes each side or until tender and charred. Transfer to a large platter. Serve with olives, cold meats, hummus, tomatoes and crisp bread.
